NBEV The concerning part about this company is that they keep pushing this idea that they want to be the worlds leading healthy beverage maker but their beverages arent what they make their money on Its their DSD side of the business AND they use Morinda for the impressive revenue Dont get me wrong I enjoy their actual product Bucha live is delicious and Cocolibre Sparkling is very refreshing However they flat out arent popular with consumers And BW clearly stated that he doesnt care about advertising their product and he doesnt find it effective Their social media presence is so weak Mediajel where are you and the market for kombucha tea coffee and coconut water is already very saturated Other companies who DGAF have put out their CBD products in US stores already while New Age waits on the FDA Im not bashing at all its my assessment from following and trading this company for a couple of years
